title: Verify Social Club landing page displays correctly for new users - ANDROID
description: Validate social club landing page displays correctly for new users
preconditions: User is logged into RoaminRabbit Android app; User has never accessed Social Club before; User is not a Social Club member
step_3_expected:
Landing page displays successfully with:
- Large full-width introductory image that changes every 1000ms
- Animated scroll indicator below headline
- 'About Section' showing current member count
- Display of 35 most recent members' profile pictures (only members with uploaded photos)
- Preview of upcoming events (earliest event from CMS)
- Up to 5 avatars of most recent member registrations
- 'X Participants' tag pulled from event management
- 'Request to Join' button visible at bottom (sticky placement)

title: Verify Social Club landing page displays correctly for new users - IOS
description: Validate social club landing page displays correctly for new users

- Large full-width introductory image that changes every 1000ms
- Animated scroll indicator below headline
- 'About Section' showing current member count
- Display of 35 most recent members' profile pictures (only members with uploaded photos)
- Preview of upcoming events (earliest event from CMS)
- Up to 5 avatars of most recent member registrations
- 'X Participants' tag pulled from event management
- 'Request to Join' button visible at bottom (sticky placement)

title: Verify 'Request to Join' button remains sticky on scroll - ANDROID
description: Validate 'request to join' button remains sticky on scroll
preconditions: User is on Social Club landing page; User is not an approved member
step_1_action: Scroll down through landing page sections
step_4_expected:
Request to Join button:
- Remains visible at bottom of screen at all times during scroll
- Maintains sticky placement throughout all scroll sections
- Button is always accessible without needing to scroll back

title: Open Request to Join form modal when CTA clicked - ANDROID
description: Validate open request to join form modal when cta clicked
preconditions: User is on Social Club landing page; User is not an approved member; 'Request to Join' button is visible
step_2_expected:
Modal opens with membership request form containing:
- First Name field (prefilled if available)
- Last Name field (prefilled if available)
- WhatsApp Number field with country code selector (prefilled if available and user has done registration)
- Gender selection (single selection required)
- Age Group selection (single selection required)
- Submit button at bottom

- 'Invite Friends' button
hasSeenWelcomeModal flag set to true

description: Validate event details page displays complete event information
preconditions: Event exists in CMS with complete data:; - Event Name: 'Jakarta Networking Night'; - Date: 'Saturday, 28 December 2024'; - Location: 'Jakarta, Indonesia'; - Time: '18:00 - 21:00'; - Max capacity: 50; - Current registrations: 35; - Multiple event images; User is logged in as approved member

Event Details page displays:
- Event Hero Carousel with swipe-enabled images and indicators
- Event Title: 'Jakarta Networking Night'
- Event Metadata Badges: 'Saturday, 28 December 2024', 'Jakarta, Indonesia', '18:00 - 21:00'
- Registration Status: '35 Registrations', profile circles of 6 most recent registrants
- 'Spots Left' badge NOT shown (more than 10 spots available)
- About Section with event description (truncated with 'View more information' expand)
- 'Register' button visible at bottom

description: Validate accept waitlisted user when event at full capacity
preconditions: Admin views waitlist; Event capacity: 50, current registrations: 50 (FULL); Waitlisted user exists
step_1_action: Verify event is at full capacity (50/50)
step_4_expected: Step completes as expected
step_5_expected:
System overrides capacity limitation:
- Waitlisted user accepted even though event was full
- Registration count increases to 51 (exceeds original capacity)
- System allows manual capacity override by admin
- Valid ticket generated
- User converted to Registered status
- Capacity now shows 51/50 in CMS

title: Search attendees by name in registration table
description: Validate search attendees by name in registration table
preconditions: Admin views registration table; Multiple registrations exist including 'John Doe', 'Jane Smith', 'Bob Johnson'
step_1_action: Locate search bar in registration table
step_4_expected: Step completes as expected
step_5_expected:
Search functions correctly:
- Real-time filtering by registrant name
- Case-insensitive search
- Typing 'Jane' shows 'Jane Smith'
- Typing 'DOE' shows 'John Doe'
- Empty result shows appropriate message

title: Export event registrations as CSV
description: Validate export event registrations as csv
preconditions: Admin views registration table for 'Jakarta Networking Night'; 45 registered attendees; Current date: December 19, 2024
step_4_expected:
CSV export successful:
- File downloaded with name: 'jakarta_networking_night_registrations_20241219.csv'
- CSV contains all attendee data from table
- Columns: No, Order Code, Date Registered, Account ID, Name, Number, Email
- All 45 registrations present in export
- Data properly formatted for spreadsheet viewing
- Can be used for event check-in or communications

title: Verify inline validation errors prevent invalid event updates
description: Validate inline validation errors prevent invalid event updates
preconditions: Admin is editing event details
step_1_action: Clear Event Name field (make it empty)
step_4_expected: Step completes as expected
step_5_expected:
Multiple validation errors shown:
- Event Name field highlighted: 'Event name is required'
- Time field highlighted: 'Invalid time format (must be HH:MM)'
- Max Registrations highlighted: 'Must be greater than 0'
- All invalid fields shown inline with red highlight
- 'Update Event' button disabled
- Cannot save until all errors resolved
